import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import Helmet from '../components/Helmet/Helmet' import CommonSection from '../components/Ui/CommonSection' import products from '../assets/data/products' const ProductDetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const product = products.find(item => item.id === id) const { imgUrl, productName, price, avgRating, review, description } = product return (

{productName}
) } export default ProductDetails
